channel.title: Pk4pk and everyone else
channel.description: There are ways to get your money from accounts. I dont really want to say publicly because if the way to do it leaks out into the runescape game then people will be spreading it around, and that would be bad because then jagex would put a stop to it. The way I know is, I bought 1m from a website to see how they magicly get it to your account in around 40 mins. I figured they used bounty hunter. I was wrong, they use the grand exchange, They didnt clear the history when I got back on. I know what they use and how they do it =D
